We decided to do a nostalgic song to commemorate our 5th anniversary this time.
We will have our 5th anniversary live in a little while!
Yay!
June 30 at Yoyogi National Stadium 1st Gymnasium
Girls' Girls 5th Anniversary LIVE
We are Girls' Girls THE LIVE!
